questions.text: All of these are Terry Pratchett novels, except?
questions.explanation:
'Doubleday'.

	'The Truth' is from the 'Discworld' series, 'Truckers' is Pratchett's first novel and 'The Dark Side Of The Sun' is pre 'Discworld'. Doubleday is the publisher of Terry Pratchett's books.

questions.text: All of these are Stephen Donaldson books, except?
questions.explanation:
'The Carpet People'.

	'White Gold Wielder' is from the 'Second Chronicles of Thomas Covenant, The Unbeliever'. 'A Man Rides Through' is from the Mordant series and 'A Dark And Hungry God Arises'is from the Gap series. 'Carpet People' is by Terry Pratchett.

questions.text: All of these are works by Douglas Adams, except?
options: 'The Restaurant At The End Of The Universe'
'The Long Dark Tea Time Of The Soul'
questions.explanation:
'The Man Who Killed His Brother'.

	The 'Hitchhiker's Guide' and 'The Restaurant at the End of the Universe' are from the same series. 'The Long Dark tea Time of the Soul' is an unusual Earthbound novel. 'The Man Who Killed His Brother' is by Stephen Donaldson.

questions.text: All of these are fantasy efforts by Stephen King, except?
questions.explanation:
'Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency'.

	All three novels are from the popular 'Dark Tower' series. The odd one out is by Douglas Adams.

questions.text: All of these are books by J.R.R. Tolkien, except?
questions.explanation:
'The Power That Preserves'.

	They are from the classic 'Lord of the Rings' series. 'The Power That Preserves' is by Stephen Donaldson.

questions.text: All of these are works by Terry Brooks, except?
questions.explanation:
'Wizard In Glass'.

	Terry Brooks is a prolific writer of the genre. 'Wizzard In Glass' is by Stephen King.

questions.text: All of these are novels by Arthur C. Clarke, except?
questions.explanation:
'Only You Can Save Mankind'.

	Clarke is one of the Greats. 'Only You can save Mankind' is by Terry Pratchett.

questions.text: All of these books are by Isaac Asimov, except?
questions.explanation:
'A Fall of Moondust'.

questions.text: All of these are books by Ray Bradbury, except?
questions.explanation:
'Men At Arms'.

	'The Martian Chronicles' is a classic among classics. 'Men At Arms' is by Terry Pratchet.
